name: Hercules Ladder Back Restaurant Bar Stool w Curved Support Bar

reviews.name: Metal Ladder Back Bar Stool 31", Black
reviews.reviewText: Spent many hours trying to find some bar stools for our pool table. Wife suggested check Wal-Mart on-line... Glad we did... Delivered in 3 days, wrapped with no scratches. 4 screws (5 minutes) and it was ready, made for a business environment (will hold my 240 pound son-in-law).. Excellent buy.... Cost $49 was about 1/2 the price of most furniture stores... Even tried CraigLook or list as some call it and used prices were about the same as Wal-mart new prices...
reviews.title: Excellent buy

reviews.name: Metal Ladder Back Bar Stool 31", Black
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these stools for my son's new apartment after looking at many in the stores, some more expensive. They are for three college graduates living downtown Chicago. These came packaged better than any product I've ever ordered, completely protected from damage and scratches by the manufacturer. They are sturdy, comfortable and don't take up a lot of room. The only thing that would be better is a higher back for really tall people. They were so easy to put together and the picture is a perfect representation of the product.
reviews.title: Exceeded expectations

reviews.name: Metal Ladder Back Bar Stool 31", Black
reviews.reviewText: These bar stools are great! They came packaged extremely well (we bought 6 of them and it took an hour just to get them out of their packaging) and not a single one had a scratch, dent, etc. They are solid, sturdy, and comfortable and I wouldn't hesitate to buy more should the need arise.
reviews.title: Great product - Great price

reviews.name: Metal Ladder Back Bar Stool 31", Black
reviews.reviewText: This is my second choice for bar stools. My first choice was a wooden structure that did not hold up in my household. I like this stools, it one piece and the feet glide nice on my bamboo floors. Great buy.
reviews.title: Bar Stools

reviews.name: Metal Ladder Back Bar Stool 31", Black
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for a higher bar stool and one that was strong and simple. This fit the bill nicely. Easy to put together, although it did take 2 people. No scratches or dents-well packaged for shipping. Comfortable, and especially appreciative of the non-scratch bottoms of the legs that not only protect floor but also adjust individually to help with leveling the chair. We have an older home that did not have a level surface apparently. The ends of the legs screw in or out for leveling purposes. Very pleased with the look. Simple and attractive.
reviews.title: Excellent for the money and well-packaged.
